profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development, productionization, and maintenance of predictive models. While Generative AI is mentioned in the context of specific financial use cases (e.g., preventing revenue leakage), the core responsibilities and required skills align more closely with traditional ML Engineering, focusing on data engineering, feature engineering, model training, evaluation, and MLOps for predictive systems. The role involves building and maintaining production-grade systems for predictive modeling, which is a hallmark of an ML Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The description states 'fully immerse yourself in the context of the business in order to come up with the best solution to the challenge' and 'Meet with stakeholders and subject matter experts to gain a better understanding of the underlying business problem and the requirements'. It also mentions translating 'Data Science requirements translate to architectural components and way of working' and focusing on 'improving decision making in financial processes'.
job_tasks.phrase: fully immerse yourself in the context of the business

job_tasks.justification: The description states 'Meet with stakeholders and subject matter experts to gain a better understanding of the underlying business problem and the requirements'.
job_tasks.phrase: Meet with stakeholders and subject matter experts to gain a better understanding of the underlying business problem and the requirements

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'Determine how Data Science requirements translate to architectural components and way of working'.
job_tasks.phrase: Determine how Data Science requirements translate to architectural components and way of working

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions the team's core focus is 'improving decision making in financial processes around KLM'.
job_tasks.phrase: improving decision making in financial processes

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'Perform feature engineering, be creative and combine new sources with the traditional data warehouses or our vast data lakes to increase model performance'.
job_tasks.phrase: Perform feature engineering, be creative and combine new sources with the traditional data warehouses or our vast data lakes

job_tasks.justification: The description states 'Perform exploratory data analysis to assess data quality and gain important insights'.
job_tasks.phrase: Perform exploratory data analysis to assess data quality and gain important insights

job_tasks.justification: The description states 'Work on prediction models, which are used in KLM live customer interactions 24/7.'

The description mentions 'Research and choose an appropriate set of potential models and loss functions that align with the problem and discuss validation strategies with your fellow data scientists'.
job_tasks.phrase: Research and choose an appropriate set of potential models and loss functions

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'Can we use GenAI models to prevent revenue leakage during our invoicing process?' indicating the use of generative models for specific tasks.
job_tasks.phrase: Can we use GenAI models to prevent revenue leakage

job_tasks.justification: The description states 'Execute experiments while logging your model's metrics, parameters and metadata to a model registry for easy sharing and reproducibility'.
job_tasks.phrase: logging your model's metrics, parameters and metadata to a model registry

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'Maintain and/or improve your model through monitoring, re-training, adding new features etc.'.
The description states 'Put your model into production, and work together with engineers inside and outside of the team to ensure company-wide production standards are met'.
The description mentions 'Be a reliable partner for the business: ensuring robust, tested code, quality control, as well as maintaining existing solutions.'
job_tasks.phrase: ensuring robust, tested code, quality control, as well as maintaining existing solutions

job_tasks.justification: The description states 'Put your model into production, and work together with engineers inside and outside of the team to ensure company-wide production standards are met'.
job_tasks.phrase: ensure company-wide production standards are met

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'Maintain and/or improve your model through monitoring, re-training, adding new features etc.'.
The description mentions 'Guide our upcoming transition to the cloud: Identify requirements and improvements, communicate them to relevant parties'.
job_tasks.phrase: Guide our upcoming transition to the cloud

job_tasks.justification: The description states 'Put ML use cases into production, adopting a practical and pragmatic mindset.'
job_tasks.phrase: Put ML use cases into production

discuss validation strategies with your fellow data scientists

work closely with our contacts in the business
